title: How to Clean a PC Fan

steps.title: Unplug your computer.
steps.content: Unplug your computer. After this is done you are ready to open your computer up.

steps.title: After taking the side panel off, disable or turn off the power supply in the computer.
steps.content: After taking the side panel off, disable or turn off the power supply in the computer.

steps.title: Unplug your PC's fan from the motherboard.
steps.content: Unplug your PC's fan from the motherboard. Simply pull the fans cord out of the motherboard to unplug it.

steps.title: Get your can of compressed air start spraying.
steps.content: Get your can of compressed air start spraying. Hold the can at an angle, so the fan turns when you spray.

steps.title: Once the fan is cleaned, plug everything back in.
steps.content: Once the fan is cleaned, plug everything back in. Plug in the power supply last and enjoy faster computing!
